name: Quantum Pacman
description:
The year is 2120, Pacman is finally in the quantum realm, but everything seems to be broken.
He needs to collect all the quantum particles to go back home, but Robo-Ghosts are stopping his path. What's worse is that due to the quantum energy, they are very unstable and jumps between locations on the map.
However, Pacman is prepared and made his own quantum leap armor, using which he can teleport. You need to help Pacman to collect all quantum particles and go back to Mrs. Pacman.

Controls:
Arrow keys to Move
Arrow key + Space to Jump 2 blocks in that direction.

Game made for Trijam #100
Theme: Retro Games

Time Taken (According to my timer)
Sprites: 57 minutes
Programming: 1 hour 14 minutes
Bug Fixing: 25 minutes
Adding Audio: extra 15 minutes

Total Time: 2 hours 51 Minutes

Sprites made by me
Sound effects taken from freesound.org
BGM: Searching by Eric Skiff
